condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Targeted Countries in the region adopt and/or implement strategies and policies to improve education

description.narrative: Addressing key challenges around access and learning, UNICEF MENARO spearheaded research on children and youth who are out of school, contributing to inclusive policies and additional resource mobilization, developed the LSCE framework as a basis for fundamental change of the learning agenda, meeting all targets set for the SP period. | Status:Met | As-of Date:01/02/2018

title.narrative: Number of countries with nationally mainstreamed programmes to address equity in education at basic and post-basic levels
